summary: The diff implements all four requirements: the header now uses the uploaded TAPI OK brand logo with a permanent #D32F2F background color, the brand color variable is set to #D32F2F in the CSS, and the HomePage replaces the purple chip with the TAPI OK brand logo. All requirements have corresponding implementation evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: White text and icons in the header for contrast against the red background
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff shows navigation links and UI elements using white text/icons (text-white classes) for visibility against #D32F2F, but this specific styling approach was not requested in the BuildRequest

hallucinated_features.description: Header uses white/20 opacity for hover effects on navigation items
hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation includes hover:bg-white/20 styling for interactive elements, which was not specified in the requirements
